                        <!-- highlight -->
                        <div class="list-item-level1 ">
                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header">
                                <div>
                                    <!-- 用户昵称 -->
                                    <h3>
                                        <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/member/1956934920/pinglun" target="_blank">豆豆拌玉米</a>
                                    </h3>
                                    <!-- 作者标识 -->
                                                                        <!-- 用户等级 -->
                                                                            <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/user/tequan/" target="_blank">
                                            <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-level" src="https://res.smzdm.com/h5/h5_user/dist/assets/level/8.png">
                                        </a>
                                                                                                                <!-- 勋章 -->
                                        <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-medal" src="https://qneimg.smzdm.com/202501/15/67876806614b55246.png" alt="">
                                                                    </div>

                                <div id="actionBox" class="margin-right-15">

                                    <div class="action-sheet">
                                        <a class="jubao" href="javascript:void(0);" id="report_343730794" style="display:inline-block">举报</a>

                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment padding-right-10">
                                <!-- 置顶标签 -->
                                                                <span>🈶️，2个3元</span>
                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->

                                    <span>04-02 20:53</span>

                                        <span>山西</span>

                                </div>
                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 end -->
                                <div class="content-operation"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-operation -->

                                    <div class="J_zan comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_343730794" data-item="3, 1, 343730794, 144866327, 343730794">

                                </div>

                            <!-- 展示出的回复框 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea">
                                <!-- 回复表单 在隐藏域中填写参数 -->
                                <form class="comment-quick-form" onsubmit="return false;" method="post" action="">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="type" value="3">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="comment_type" value="">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="pid" value="144866327">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="parentid" value="343730794">
                                    <textarea name="content" placeholder="回复给豆豆拌玉米"></textarea>
                                </form>
                                <!-- 表情包及表单提交操作 -->
                                <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea-opertion">
                                    <div class="comment_smileBox">
                                        <i class="icon-expression"></i>
                                        <div class="smileLayerBg" id="smiley" style="display: none;"></div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div>
                                        <p>校验提示文案</p>
                                        <div class="J_submit">提交</div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <!-- 二级评论 -->
                        <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-reply">
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-reply-container">
                                                            </div>
                                                    </div>
                    </div>
                </li>
                
                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论说明 start -->
                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论说明 end -->

            </ul>
                        <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠的评论 end -->
            <!-- 分页样式 -->
                    </div>
    </div>
    <!-- 评论列表 end -->
    
</section>
<!-- 删除评论的二次确认弹窗 -->

        <!-- column流标题 -->
      <div class="z-side-head z-clearfix">
          <div class="z-side-title">
              <div class="side-head-tab J_side_tab">
